des: "This is a great dessert item!  These strawberry sparkles are sweet and delicious!  Try them anytime you get a sweet tooth!  They also add fantastic color to your table.  Try making red, white, and blue sugar color for a great Fourth of July look.  Great at picnics also!"
ins:
In a small bowl, beat together cream cheese, confectioners' sugar, milk and vanilla until smooth.  Chill 2 hours in refrigerator.
Stir together white sugar and food coloring.  Dip strawberries in cream cheese mixture, then in tinted sugar.  Refrigerate until serving.
